phrases.phrase: By clicking the below "{button}" button, you have agreed to our Terms of Service.
Your payment has been rejected with this message: "{message}". Please try again later or contact our staff for support. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
Your payment has been rejected for unknown reason. Please try again later or contact our staff for support. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
Thank you, your payment has been accepted.
